summary: A small, simple mod that does exactly what it says on the tin.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]OH YES, DOWN HERE THEY ALL... [/size][size=3]sink?
[/size]

This mod simply changes the buoyancy of bone, flesh and skin, making everything in these materials, including corpses, slowly drift to the bottom of water instead of float on the surface.

It can be very satisfying to watch the bodies sink into the murky depths, and they still float just enough to get dragged along river beds by the stream.

This mod should be compatible with all other mods affecting water in the game, as well as ragdolls.


[i]Installation:
[/i]1. Open the Zip Archive.
2. Drag and drop "Sinking Bodies.esp" into your Skyrim/Data folder.
3. Enable "Sinking Bodies" in your Skyrim mod load order window.
4. Play
author: lassenissen
